scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy-my: git checkout -b tmp-for-deploy && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix out tmp-for-deploy`:gh-pages --force && git checkout main && git branch -D tmp-for-deploy
